title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8123.10 - Town of Croghan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8123.10 - Town of Croghan

State Regulations
(a) CR 8 (Main

Street) between the intersection of Route 126 and the entrance to the Boise-
Cascade Plant, a distance of 0.8+- mile, is designated as an access highway for
use by 48-foot long, 102-inch wide trailers and is not hereby designated as an
access highway for any other types of vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8123.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
